thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com | 2 of 101
thread.title: A. T.

author: A. T.
title: A. T.
text: Been using for two years, couldn't be happier with ease of use for easy cashback and coupons. Only complaint was I had a large purchase (mattress) over a year ago, and specifically chose a store with a high cash back percentage, that wasn't the cheapest store unless you figured in the cashback. I never got the cashback, and I opened a support ticket and nothing was resolved. I'm over it now, and never have had any other issues, but for someone more anal than me, the lack of resolving a support issue could be annoying.
